meta.name: description
meta.content: The Eastampton Community School is a public school which provides an education for students in grades K-8 in the Eastampton Township area of New Jersey.
The Eastampton Community School is a public school which provides an education for students in grades K-8 in the Eastampton Township area of New Jersey.

meta.content: The Eastampton Community School is a public school which provides an education for students in grades K-8 in the Eastampton Township area of New Jersey.
